experience.title: Software Development Intern Backend
experience.description: • Worked to Improve existing micro services that the infrastructure uses byredesigning the interface based implementation. Rewrote microservices which neededless latency from NodeJS to Golang and achieved a reduction in latency and hugereduction in memory usage using cache• Developed unit testing and integration testing using suites package in Golang toprovide extensive coverage, it involved working with various db like Postgres andcaching using Redis• Worked on Github actions workflows to prepare the yml files, to ensure CI/CD anddeploy code in our servers• Used Go standard library packages along with the external packages like gin gonic forrouters, testify, suite for testing, errors and many others.

positions.subtitle: Branding and Relations Cell IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: -Successfully covered Illumination, the unique culture of celebrating Diwali in IIT Kharagpur in various national news channels including Doordarshan, AAJ-Tak, CNN-IBN and various other news channels.-Played a pivotal role in organizing Foundation Program on the occassion of foundation day of IIT KGP.-Conducted a benchmark analysis about the QS ranking of top universities and suggested changes for the betterment of the institute.-Organized a Counselling Forum (online platform) for the students aspiring to join various engineering colleges which saw a participation of more than 13,000 students from all over India. -Organized main event of BARC called YIP(Young Innovator's Program) which is an all india level competition for school students to showcase their scientific abilities.
positions.title: Student Member
positions.description_html:
-Successfully covered Illumination, the unique culture of celebrating Diwali in IIT Kharagpur in various national news channels including Doordarshan, AAJ-Tak, CNN-IBN and various other news channels.

-Played a pivotal role in organizing Foundation Program on the occassion of foundation day of IIT KGP.

-Conducted a benchmark analysis about the QS ranking of top universities and suggested changes for the betterment of the institute.

-Organized a Counselling Forum (online platform) for the students aspiring to join various engineering colleges which saw a participation of more than 13,000 students from all over India. -Organized main event of BARC called YIP(Young Innovator's Program) which is an all india level competition for school students to showcase their scientific abilities.
